doc:
Betty Lou Bredemus https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Betty_Lou_Bredemus 0 Betty Lou Bredemus (August 13, 1934 – February 19, 2015) was an American actress and acting coach. The matriarch of the Roberts family, which includes Academy Award-winning actress Julia Roberts, Academy Award- nominee actor Eric Roberts, and granddaughter Emma Roberts, she also served in the United States Air Force and received a National Defense Service Medal for her service, which was spent entertaining the troops in Air Force base theatrical productions. Betty_Lou_Bredemus ( August_13_,_1934 – February_19_,_2015 ) was an_American_actress and acting coach . The_matriarch of the_Roberts_family , which includes Academy_Award-winning_actress_Julia_Roberts , Academy_Award - nominee_actor_Eric_Roberts , and granddaughter_Emma_Roberts , she also served in the_United_States_Air_Force and received a_National_Defense_Service_Medal for her_service , which was_spent entertaining the_troops in Air_Force_base_theatrical_productions .
